K12D0547_H0509:472a-1: ku m'a ra bh'u t'a ya /
K12D0547_H0509:472a-4: mah'a ka ru ni k'a ya /
K12D0547_H0509:472a-6: aom aa ra dze pi ra dze /
K12D0547_H0509:472a-8: sho dha ni bi sho dha ni /
K12D0547_H0509:472a-13: ru ru tsa le h'um h'um h'um/
K12D0547_H0509:472a-17: ston par byed pa de ni blo rno dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12D0547_H0509:472a-18: lan gcig bton na gzungs brgya 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0547_H0509:472a-19: bskal pa stong du bsags pa'i sdig pa ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0547_H0509:472a-20: 'bum phrag gcig bzlas ni rig pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0547_H0509:472a-21: 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur /
K12D0547_H0509:472a-22: 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na 'jam dpal gyi sku mthong bar 'gyur ro //
